mapper.select: SELECT PREG_GOODS_NO /* prPregPrestHist.getPregPrestHist */ , SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,7,2) AS APLY_STR_DT , SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,7,2) AS APLY_END_DT , PREST_NM , USE_YN , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_PREG_PREST_HIST WHERE PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo} ORDER BY APLY_STR_DT, APLY_END_DT
